title: SmartLead Sheet Sync: Auto-Capture Client Inquiries to Google Sheets
author: David Olusola

readme:
Capture client inquiries from any webform and send them straight into Google Sheets — automatically. No code. No headaches.

🚀 What It Does:

SmartLead Sheet Sync is a plug-and-play automation that:  
• Instantly receives form submissions from your website or funnel via a webhook  
• Extracts and formats key info (like name, email, business name, message, timeline, budget)  
• Logs everything into a Google Sheet — in real time

Perfect for freelancers, digital agencies, consultants, and productized service owners who want to stop copying/pasting leads manually.

⸻

⚙️ What You Get:  
• A pre-built 3-step automation (Webhook → Code → Google Sheet)  
• Ready-to-use setup in n8n (free and open source automation tool)  
• Clean, editable JavaScript code to format your incoming lead data  
• Google Sheet connection that logs every new inquiry in its own row
readme_zh:
自动抓取任何网页表单的客户询盘，并直接同步至Google表格——全程自动化。无需编程，轻松无忧。

🚀 核心功能：

SmartLead表格同步是一款即插即用自动化工具，它能：  
• 通过网页钩子实时接收网站或销售漏斗的表单提交  
• 自动提取并格式化关键信息（如姓名、邮箱、公司名称、留言、时间线、预算）  
• 将所有数据实时记录到Google表格  

特别适合自由职业者、数字营销机构、顾问和标准化服务商，从此告别手动复制/粘贴潜在客户信息。

⸻

⚙️ 您将获得：  
• 预制三步自动化流程（网页钩子→代码→Google表格）  
• 即装即用的n8n配置方案（免费开源自动化工具）  
• 可编辑的JavaScript代码，自由定制询盘数据格式  
• 自动化的Google表格连接，每条新询盘独立成行记录
